page.title: 17FARMING (2)
page.content: 500 years ago.It has always been a farm,Mr Britton has lived here 48 years,and enjoys living here. The workers on the farm start work roughly 7am. They finish roughly at 5.30pm. Lately a storage building has been taken down, because of the rotting wood. In the farm there is a cider store,where they used to make cider. The press is still there but it has not been used since 1936.There is a big orchard full of apple trees.Mr Britton has traced his family back to the 1800's.And all his family were farmers. The farmhouse is very big and old,the roof is thatched at the front,and slate at the back.There are 250 acres of farmland.The link road has made a difference to the farmer, as it has gone though the middle of their land, but they've made a bridge from one side of the link road to
